review:
Hi , I am Raksha , 24 years old (5.7 ht .100kg wt) . I got done IUI procedure by Dr.Apoorva Reddy  and got pregnant in that cycle done .   Dr asked me to give blood test ie tsh, hba1c, vit d , HIV in this clinic only . They told once the reports are ready , you will get a call from clinic regarding the tests given . I got a call from clinic after a day , saying that everything in reports are fine only sugar is bit high so avoid any sugary foods that’s it . I asked them to send the reports by any means either by WhatsApp or email . They told will send in 5 mins but they never sent at all . I kept on calling but no one sent them . I had appointment with dr after two weeks . When I went that time they had kept the reports in my file only after two weeks of giving my blood test . Then seeing reports the dr tells me that my thyroid is HIGH , VITAMIN D IS VERY LOW and HBA1C is slightly elevated. So immediately start with thyroid tablets , vit d and come back after a week for a scan . **** *** *** ***** ********** **** ** ** ***** ****  *** ***** ** **** *** *** ******* ********** **** ***** ** **** * 
I came back after a week for a scan. Scan was done and they told heartbeat is very less and be ready for anything to happen , and we’ll wait for a week for another scan . The dr didn’t give any hope but told we might have to abort if we didn’t hear any heart beat in next week . After a week , the heartbeat was completely stopped and she told that we have to abort it immediately. Gave medications , I started bleeding heavy and after two weeks came back and scanned for remains . There was a less than 1 cm remains in the cervix. Dr. Apoorva Pallam Reddy asked me to do D&E ( which costs ₹.35000) immediately and she asked me start to prep for the surgery on the same day . I trusted her and got done D&E .  

After two period cycles , she suggested we do an IUI again . We did , and we conceived in that cycle also .  This time when we went to Dr, she didn’t ask me take any other blood test other than beta Hcg . **** *** *** ****** ********** ** **** * She put me on blood thinner injections which I have to put every day where single injections they prescribe cost ₹425 . Along with lot other ,only medications which will cost you per day ₹250 . (₹.675 per day * 8 weeks ) . This time for up to 8 weeks of my pregnancy I was taking all these meds and inj daily, but after 8 weeks scan the dr said that my pregnancy was a blighted ovum and we should immediately abort . But this time she said we have to do a D&E SURGERY ITSELF DIRECTLY AND SEND THE PRODUCTS FOR GENETICAL TESTING WHICH WILL COST ME 35000 for D&E AND 18000 for GENETIC TESTING . First of all I would like to thank Dr. Apoorva Pallam Reddy for making our bundle of joy that am mother of Twins. I had a condition called endometriosis which was hindering pregnancy. We have been trying various treatments from 2017 onwards which included HSG and other tests. Nothing was working, that's when we heard of Dr. Apoorva Pallam Reddy from one of our family members in 2021. Dr.Apoorva studied all the past procedures done then she told that first do a laparoscopy and then an IUI/IVF based on the body response. Initially we were skeptical about it. In April 2021 I underwent a HSG and laparoscopic procedure to get the root cause of hindering pregnancy and found its grade 4 endometriosis.We went for IUI as planned and it not successful but we continued for 3 more cycles of IUI's and failed 4 times. Dr. Apoorva Pallam Reddy advised us to go for IVF.The first IVF also was successful.
 
The best part of Dr. Apoorva Pallam Reddy is she is very well planned and executes the plan with precision. While planning she prepares for every contingency and has a backup plan as well. With all this she keeps the patient informed about her proceeding which builds immense trust with the doctor.
